Reviews.Title: Really nice phone.
Reviews.Author: CM
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived in four days. Great phone. Great value. Works with all the functions as an S3. I would say it is about the same as the Galaxy S3 (that I already have), only smaller. I was apparently made for a foreign market, as the phone and instructions  were in a foreign language.It came with a foreign charger plug, but, it did have the adapter for US outlet. Changed the phone to English and installed some apps. Found a Samsung site, online, with the overview and English downloadable manual. I bought and sent the phone for my son, to replace replace his older phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, Excellent for my 11 year old son
Reviews.Author: Maron P. Samuel
Reviews.Content: My son wanted a Samsung product and this phone is the great quality I have known to expect from Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Carlos V. Bahnson "curlyhair774"
Reviews.Content: The phone totally satisfied my expectations. New apps were easy to install and were easy and quick to use. Works well with WiFi and the local cell phone lines. GPS is very clear and up to date. The pictures show very well on the screen. The battery should last longer as I have to charge it at least once a day.

ProductInfo.Features: This is a GSM phone and does NOT work with: Verizon, Sprint, or MetroPCS.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Fame S6810P 5MP, 3G, Jelly Bean GPS, WIFI Factory Unlocked World Mobile Phone - Blue
